mapper.insert: insert into task (id, request_uuid, user_id, type, body, status,integral, exec_source, create_time, update_time, is_delete) values (#{id}, #{requestUuid}, #{userId}, #{type}, #{body}, #{status}, #{integral}, #{execSource}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDelete})
mapper.select: select * from task where is_delete = 0 and id = #{id}
mapper.update:
update task
user_id = #{userId},
type = #{type},
body = #{body},
integral = #{integral},
status = #{status},
exec_source = #{execSource},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where is_delete = 0 and id = #{id}
